oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Buddy Emmons - 1963-09-30
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hotel room jam session performance with Buddy Emmons (pedal steel), Buddy Cornwall (electric lead guitar) and Dale Thomas (acoustic guitar) from a Cedar Rapids, Iowa Holiday Inn hotel room on September 30, 1963. Emmons had injured his leg jumping from the second floor balcony the night before.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Buddy Emmons; Dale Thomas; Buddy Cornwall;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Performs Bill Bailey, Won't You Please Come Home / (06:18) Performs Caravan (10:44) Performs Sweet Georgia Brown / (14:05) Performs Bach Rendition / (15:14) Just A Bunch Of Licks with talking in background / (16:39) Performs Camptown Ladies / (18:00) More bunch of licks with talking / (18:57) Impromptu woodshedding and practice / (20:38) Performs Gonna Build a Mountain / (23:55) Performs Home In San Antone / (25:24) Begins using pedals / (26:52) Performs Blues In C / (28:51) Blues In C (Dale Thomas on steel) / (29:13) Performs C Jam / (37:23) Performs song identified on insert as Old Black Magic (not confirmed) / (43:30) Performs Witchcraft / (45:59) Recording end / (46:09) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: See info below about accompanying typed letter.
